snippet: Houston Scarborough coach Ajani Sanders understands there are people who don't think his 0-10 team with a 57-game losing streak should be in the Texas high school football playoffs....

headline.print_headline: Texas High School Makes Playoffs at 0-10
headline.main: Texas High School Makes Playoffs at 0-10

lead_paragraph: Houston Scarborough coach Ajani Sanders understands there are people who don't think his 0-10 team with a 57-game losing streak should be in the Texas high school football playoffs.
